archimate:DataObject.name: Clinical Data Repository
archimate:DataObject.documentation:
Clinical Data Repository (CDR)
• Purpose: Centralized, normalized storage of clinical data from multiple source systems
• Data Sources: EHR, EMR, LIMS, RIS, PACS, HIS, external systems • Data Types: Structured clinical data, unstructured documents, images, signals • Architecture: Relational databases, NoSQL databases, document stores, time-series databases • Processing: Real-time data ingestion, data validation, normalization, enrichment • Access: APIs for application access, query interfaces, data export capabilities • Benefits: Single source of truth, improved data quality, enhanced analytics
